subject: refactor: rename tabs and fix Discover section layout
body:
Tab renames to better reflect content:
- Overview → Summary (it summarizes stats from other tabs)
- Activity → Timeline (content is temporal: charts, heatmaps, timing)
- Work → Breakdown (decomposes data by type, person, category)

Discover tab first section fixes:
- Section title "Discover" → "Metrics" (redundant with tab name)
- Move Shuffle button out of CollapsibleSection header (a11y: interactive inside interactive)
- Add aria-label to pin/unpin buttons
- Fix select dropdown styling for consistent cross-browser rendering

Also rename "Work Summary" section to "Summary" in ProgressTab.

https://claude.ai/code/session_01GMATPXzqrajHVAfNycyCuX
title: rename tabs and fix Discover section layout
